snippet: For years, Ikram Goldman, the Chicago retailer, has been a champion of a mystifying label from her hometown called Creatures of the Wind, designed by Shane Gabier and his partner, Chris Peters.
abstract: For years, Ikram Goldman, the Chicago retailer, has been a champion of a mystifying label from her hometown called Creatures of the Wind, designed by Shane Gabier and his partner, Chris Peters.
lead_paragraph: For years, Ikram Goldman, the Chicago retailer, has been a champion of a mystifying label from her hometown called Creatures of the Wind, designed by Shane Gabier, a professor at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago, and his partner, Chris Peters. The line, named after a lyric from "Wild Is the Wind," the Johnny Mathis song, has had a slow build, but after the duo were finalists in this year's CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund competition, they were a little overwhelmed by the turnout at their presentation.

headline.main: Which Way Does the Wind Blow?
